message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500.  I believe it will be very valuable for you and this is a fair price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am hoping to keep my expenses lower. Would you consider selling the product for $8,800?
Hi Bob, I understand your position but I'm looking for a price closer to my initial offer. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $9,100?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand your position, I would like to propose a price of $8,900 for the product. This would allow me to stay within my budget while still obtaining the item I need.
